mapper.sql:
FROM oyMember a LEFT JOIN oymbPhone f on f.oympDefaultNy=1 AND f.oymbSeq = a.oymbSeq LEFT JOIN oymbEmail g on g.oymeDefaultNy=1 AND g.oymbSeq = a.oymbSeq
WHERE 1=1
AND a.oymbDelNy = 1 AND a.oymbDelNy = 0
AND a.oymbName LIKE concat('%',#{scOymbName},'%y')
AND a.oymbName LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%') AND a.oymbNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.oymbSeq , a.oymbName , a.oymbId , a.oymbGenderCd , a.oymbGradeCd , a.oymbDelNy , f.oympTelecomCd , f.oympNumber , g.oymeEmailFull , g.oymeEmailAccount , g.oymeEmailDomainCd
ORDER BY oymbSeq ASC limit #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}
SELECT oycdSeq , oycdName , oycgSeq FROM oyCode WHERE 1=1 AND oycdDelNy = 0 AND oycdUseNy = 1
